problem_names:
lemma congBisim:
  fixes P :: pi
  and   Q :: pi

  assumes "P \<sim>\<^sup>s Q"

  shows "P \<sim> Q"

lemma eqvtI:
  fixes P :: pi
  and   Q :: pi
  and   perm :: "name prm"

  assumes "P \<sim>\<^sup>s Q"

  shows "(perm \<bullet> P) \<sim>\<^sup>s (perm \<bullet> Q)"

lemma reflexive:
  fixes P :: pi
  
  shows "P \<sim>\<^sup>s P"

lemma symetric:
  fixes P :: pi
  and   Q :: pi
  
  assumes "P \<sim>\<^sup>s Q"
  
  shows "Q \<sim>\<^sup>s P"

lemma transitive:
  fixes P :: pi
  and   Q :: pi
  and   R :: pi
  
  assumes "P \<sim>\<^sup>s Q"
  and     "Q \<sim>\<^sup>s R"
  
  shows "P \<sim>\<^sup>s R"

lemma partUnfold:
  fixes P :: pi
  and   Q :: pi
  and   s :: "(name \<times> name) list"

  assumes "P \<sim>\<^sup>s Q"

  shows "P[<s>] \<sim>\<^sup>s Q[<s>]"
translations:
lemma congBisim:
  fixes P :: pi
  and   Q :: pi

  assumes "P \<sim>\<^sup>s Q"

  shows "P \<sim> Q"

proof (prove)
using this:
  P \<sim>\<^sup>s Q
  substClosed ?Rel \<subseteq> ?Rel

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. P \<sim> Q

lemma eqvtI:
  fixes P :: pi
  and   Q :: pi
  and   perm :: "name prm"

  assumes "P \<sim>\<^sup>s Q"

  shows "(perm \<bullet> P) \<sim>\<^sup>s (perm \<bullet> Q)"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. perm \<bullet> P \<sim>\<^sup>s perm \<bullet> Q

proof (prove)
using this:
  P \<sim>\<^sup>s Q

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. perm \<bullet> P \<sim>\<^sup>s perm \<bullet> Q

lemma reflexive:
  fixes P :: pi
  
  shows "P \<sim>\<^sup>s P"
by(force simp add: substClosed_def intro: Strong_Early_Bisim.reflexive)

lemma symetric:
  fixes P :: pi
  and   Q :: pi
  
  assumes "P \<sim>\<^sup>s Q"
  
  shows "Q \<sim>\<^sup>s P"

proof (prove)
using this:
  P \<sim>\<^sup>s Q

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. Q \<sim>\<^sup>s P
by(force simp add: substClosed_def intro: Strong_Early_Bisim.bisimE)

lemma transitive:
  fixes P :: pi
  and   Q :: pi
  and   R :: pi
  
  assumes "P \<sim>\<^sup>s Q"
  and     "Q \<sim>\<^sup>s R"
  
  shows "P \<sim>\<^sup>s R"

proof (prove)
using this:
  P \<sim>\<^sup>s Q
  Q \<sim>\<^sup>s R

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. P \<sim>\<^sup>s R
by(force simp add: substClosed_def intro: Strong_Early_Bisim.transitive)

lemma partUnfold:
  fixes P :: pi
  and   Q :: pi
  and   s :: "(name \<times> name) list"

  assumes "P \<sim>\<^sup>s Q"

  shows "P[<s>] \<sim>\<^sup>s Q[<s>]"

proof (prove)
using this:
  P \<sim>\<^sup>s Q

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. P[<s>] \<sim>\<^sup>s Q[<s>]

proof (state)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>\<sigma>.
       \<forall>\<sigma>.
          P[<\<sigma>>] \<sim> Q[<\<sigma>>] \<Longrightarrow>
       P[<s>][<\<sigma>>] \<sim> Q[<s>][<\<sigma>>]

proof (state)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>\<sigma>.
       \<forall>\<sigma>.
          P[<\<sigma>>] \<sim> Q[<\<sigma>>] \<Longrightarrow>
       P[<s>][<\<sigma>>] \<sim> Q[<s>][<\<sigma>>]

proof (state)
this:
  \<forall>s. P[<s>] \<sim> Q[<s>]

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>\<sigma>.
       \<forall>\<sigma>.
          P[<\<sigma>>] \<sim> Q[<\<sigma>>] \<Longrightarrow>
       P[<s>][<\<sigma>>] \<sim> Q[<s>][<\<sigma>>]

proof (prove)
using this:
  \<forall>s. P[<s>] \<sim> Q[<s>]

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. P[<(s @ s')>] \<sim> Q[<(s @ s')>]

proof (state)
this:
  P[<(s @ s')>] \<sim> Q[<(s @ s')>]

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>\<sigma>.
       \<forall>\<sigma>.
          P[<\<sigma>>] \<sim> Q[<\<sigma>>] \<Longrightarrow>
       P[<s>][<\<sigma>>] \<sim> Q[<s>][<\<sigma>>]

proof (state)
this:
  P[<(s @ s')>] \<sim> Q[<(s @ s')>]

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>\<sigma>.
       \<forall>\<sigma>.
          P[<\<sigma>>] \<sim> Q[<\<sigma>>] \<Longrightarrow>
       P[<s>][<\<sigma>>] \<sim> Q[<s>][<\<sigma>>]

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. P[<(s @ s')>] = P[<s>][<s'>]

proof (state)
this:
  P[<(s @ s')>] = P[<s>][<s'>]

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>\<sigma>.
       \<forall>\<sigma>.
          P[<\<sigma>>] \<sim> Q[<\<sigma>>] \<Longrightarrow>
       P[<s>][<\<sigma>>] \<sim> Q[<s>][<\<sigma>>]

proof (state)
this:
  P[<(s @ s')>] = P[<s>][<s'>]

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>\<sigma>.
       \<forall>\<sigma>.
          P[<\<sigma>>] \<sim> Q[<\<sigma>>] \<Longrightarrow>
       P[<s>][<\<sigma>>] \<sim> Q[<s>][<\<sigma>>]

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. Q[<(s @ s')>] = Q[<s>][<s'>]

proof (state)
this:
  Q[<(s @ s')>] = Q[<s>][<s'>]

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>\<sigma>.
       \<forall>\<sigma>.
          P[<\<sigma>>] \<sim> Q[<\<sigma>>] \<Longrightarrow>
       P[<s>][<\<sigma>>] \<sim> Q[<s>][<\<sigma>>]

proof (chain)
picking this:
  P[<(s @ s')>] \<sim> Q[<(s @ s')>]
  P[<(s @ s')>] = P[<s>][<s'>]
  Q[<(s @ s')>] = Q[<s>][<s'>]

proof (prove)
using this:
  P[<(s @ s')>] \<sim> Q[<(s @ s')>]
  P[<(s @ s')>] = P[<s>][<s'>]
  Q[<(s @ s')>] = Q[<s>][<s'>]

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. P[<s>][<s'>] \<sim> Q[<s>][<s'>]

proof (state)
this:
  P[<s>][<s'>] \<sim> Q[<s>][<s'>]

goal:
No subgoals!
